SEARCH
Package com.paymybuddy.appli.service

Class UserService

java.lang.Object
com.paymybuddy.appli.service.UserService
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.springframework.security.core.userdetails.UserDetailsService
@Service public class UserService extends Object implements org.springframework.security.core.userdetails.UserDetailsService
Service class responsible for user management operations, including user registration, profile updates, and relation creation. It interacts with the UserRepository to persist and retrieve user data and manages user authentication details through the UserDetailsService interface. This class also logs the different operations for traceability and debugging purposes.

    • loadUserByUsername

      public org.springframework.security.core.userdetails.UserDetails loadUserByUsername(String email) throws org.springframework.security.core.userdetails.UsernameNotFoundException
      Loads the user by their email.
      Specified by:
      loadUserByUsername in interface org.springframework.security.core.userdetails.UserDetailsService
      Parameters:
      email - The email of the user to be loaded.
      Returns:
      A UserDetails object containing the user's email and password.
      Throws:
      org.springframework.security.core.userdetails.UsernameNotFoundException - If no user with the provided email is found.

    • register

      public DBUser register(DBUser user)
      Registers a new user with the given information.
      Parameters:
      user - The DBUser object containing user details.
      Returns:
      The registered user.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If a user with the same email already exists.

    • updateProfil

      public DBUser updateProfil(org.springframework.security.core.userdetails.UserDetails userDetails, DBUser updateUser)
      Updates the profile of an existing user.
      Parameters:
      userDetails - The details of the currently authenticated user.
      updateUser - The updated user details.
      Returns:
      The updated user.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If the email already exists or the user tries to update their email to one already in use.

    • getProfil

      public DBUser getProfil(String email)
      Fetches the profile for a user by email.
      Parameters:
      email - The email of the user whose profile is to be fetched.
      Returns:
      The DBUser object corresponding to the email.

    • createRelation

      public DBUser createRelation(org.springframework.security.core.userdetails.UserDetails userDetails, String email)
      Creates a relation (connection) between two users.
      Parameters:
      userDetails - The authenticated user's details (creator of the relation).
      email - The email of the user to be added as a relation.
      Returns:
      The updated DBUser object with the new relation added.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If the relation already exists, or if the user attempts to relate to themselves, or if the email is not found.

    • isValidEmail

      public static boolean isValidEmail(String email)
      Validates whether a given string is a valid email address. A valid email address must meet the following criteria:
      • Contains text before the "@" symbol, consisting of alphanumeric characters, and optionally the characters "+", "_", ".", or "-".
      • The domain (after "@") contains alphanumeric characters, "." or "-".
      • Ends with a valid top-level domain (at least two letters).
      Parameters:
      email - the string to validate as an email address
      Returns:
      true if the email is valid, false otherwise
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if the email is null
